Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class ColorsCollection

A collection of colors defined by linear interpolation between color keys. Implemented as a System.Collections.Generic.IList<T> of ColorKey and provide ColorElements, a read only list of Windows.UI.Color.

Inheritance
System.Object
ColorsCollection
Implements

Number of elements in the color scale

public int ColorElementsCount { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Int32

Get or set the number of Windows.UI.Color in the color elements collection
Remarks

When the value is sat, the color elements list is cleared and recalculated

ScaleToColor(Double, Boolean)

Convert a scale to a Windows.UI.Color elements from the color scale.

Declaration
public Color ScaleToColor(double scale, bool inverse = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Double scale

The scale to convert as a precentage
System.Boolean inverse

If true, return the Windows.UI.Color corresponding to the inversed color scale (Optional ; Default : false)
Returns
Type Description
Windows.UI.Color

The color
Remarks

scale is a percentage and must be between 0 and 1.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException

scale Must be in the [0 , 1] range
